AVISA (a·​vi·​sa | \ä-vē-sə\ | آویسا) in Persian means like water, clean and free.

AVISA is a global leader in AI industrial advanced analytics. AVISA enables intelligent industrial operations with its AI-driven Industrial IoT platform that accelerates mission-critical decision making to minimize energy consumption, increase throughput, reduce downtime and extend the lifetime of a plant’s assets.

Today, top Iranian companies use the platform to optimize complex production processes, generate new revenue streams, and reduce energy and operating costs. Funded by Inividual Ventures, AVISA customers include leading manufacturing and oil and gas companies.
